original_text: Then Pilate let Barabbas go free, as the crowd wanted. But he said to his soldiers, ‘Hit Jesus many times with a whip. Then take him and fix him to a cross to die.’
korean_text: 이에 바라바는 그들에게 놓아 주고 예수는 채찍질하고 십자가에 못 박히게 넘겨 주니라

sentences.original_text: Then Pilate let Barabbas go free
But he said to his soldiers
'Hit Jesus many times with a whip'
and fix him to a cross to die
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 십자가에 못 박아 죽게 하라'
